verse.name: c1
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Baadhimpa bade prabhu Yesu vidudala jeya ninnu nindanu pondenu ponda nee vaanandam{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Kristu yesu nee korakedche getsamane vanamulo vaatsalyamutho ninnaanandimpa jeyun{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Rakshakudu theerpukai niliche akshaya jeeva meeya sikshanu bonde ninnaandimpa jeya{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Prabhuvaina Yesu thattuchunnaadu nee hrudaya dwaaramun abbunu shaanthi therachina hrudayamun{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jeeva jala mitchu prabhuvaina Yesu dappigoni yunna neeku jeevithaanthamu varaku dappigona ne maatramu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Rakshana durgamuna ninnunchi shatruvunu anachivesi dakshina hastamutho kappunu ninnepudu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Devuni swaramu vinudi nede daivaputru louduru Sevinchudi kristuni jeevitamularpinchi{/lang-eng}
